trans-unit.source: Globalization is the process of designing and developing your app to act appropriately for different global markets without any changes or customization.
trans-unit.target: Globalization is the process of designing and developing your app to act appropriately for different global markets without any changes or customization.

trans-unit.source: Globalization and localization
trans-unit.target: Globalization and localization

trans-unit.source: Globalization and localization
trans-unit.target: Globalization and localization

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Windows is used worldwide, by audiences that vary in culture, region, and language.
trans-unit.target: Windows is used worldwide, by audiences that vary in culture, region, and language.

trans-unit.source: A user may speak any language, or even multiple languages.
trans-unit.target: A user may speak any language, or even multiple languages.

trans-unit.source: A user may be located anywhere in the world, and may speak any language in any location.
trans-unit.target: A user may be located anywhere in the world, and may speak any language in any location.

trans-unit.source: You can increase the potential market for your app by designing it to be readily adaptable using *globalization* and *localization*.
trans-unit.target: You can increase the potential market for your app by designing it to be readily adaptable using *globalization* and *localization*.

trans-unit.source: **Globalization** is the process of designing and developing your app to act appropriately for different global markets without any changes or customization.
trans-unit.target: **Globalization** is the process of designing and developing your app to act appropriately for different global markets without any changes or customization.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can:
trans-unit.target: For example, you can:

trans-unit.source: Design the layout of your app to accommodate the different text lengths and font sizes of other languages in labels and text strings.
trans-unit.target: Design the layout of your app to accommodate the different text lengths and font sizes of other languages in labels and text strings.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve text and culture-dependent images from resources that can be adapted to different local markets, instead of hard-coding them into your app's code or markup.
trans-unit.target: Retrieve text and culture-dependent images from resources that can be adapted to different local markets, instead of hard-coding them into your app's code or markup.

trans-unit.source: Use globalization APIs to display data that are formatted differently in different regions, such as numeric values, dates, times, and currencies.
trans-unit.target: Use globalization APIs to display data that are formatted differently in different regions, such as numeric values, dates, times, and currencies.

trans-unit.source: **Localization** is the process of adapting your app to meet the language, cultural, and political requirements of a specific local market.
trans-unit.target: **Localization** is the process of adapting your app to meet the language, cultural, and political requirements of a specific local market.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: Translate the text and labels of the app for the new market, and create separate resources for its language.
trans-unit.target: Translate the text and labels of the app for the new market, and create separate resources for its language.

trans-unit.source: Modify any culture-dependent images as necessary, and place in separate resources.
trans-unit.target: Modify any culture-dependent images as necessary, and place in separate resources.

trans-unit.source: Watch this video for a brief introduction on how to prepare your app for the world: [Introduction to globalization and localization](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/One-Dev-Minute/Introduction-to-globalization-and-localization).
trans-unit.target: Watch this video for a brief introduction on how to prepare your app for the world: [Introduction to globalization and localization](https://channel9.msdn.com/Blogs/One-Dev-Minute/Introduction-to-globalization-and-localization).

trans-unit.source: Articles
trans-unit.target: Articles

trans-unit.source: Article
trans-unit.target: Article

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Do's and don'ts
trans-unit.target: Do's and don'ts

trans-unit.source: Follow these best practices when globalizing your apps for a wider audience and when localizing your apps for a specific market.
trans-unit.target: Follow these best practices when globalizing your apps for a wider audience and when localizing your apps for a specific market.

trans-unit.source: Use global-ready formats
trans-unit.target: Use global-ready formats

trans-unit.source: Develop a global-ready app by appropriately formatting dates, times, numbers, and currencies.
trans-unit.target: Develop a global-ready app by appropriately formatting dates, times, numbers, and currencies.

trans-unit.source: Manage language and region
trans-unit.target: Manage language and region

trans-unit.source: Control how Windows selects UI resources and formats the UI elements of the app, by using the various language and region settings provided by Windows.
trans-unit.target: Control how Windows selects UI resources and formats the UI elements of the app, by using the various language and region settings provided by Windows.

trans-unit.source: Use patterns to format dates and times
trans-unit.target: Use patterns to format dates and times

trans-unit.source: Use the [Windows.Globalization.DateTimeFormatting](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br206859) API with custom patterns to display dates and times in exactly the format you wish.
trans-unit.target: Use the [Windows.Globalization.DateTimeFormatting](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br206859) API with custom patterns to display dates and times in exactly the format you wish.

trans-unit.source: Adjust layout and fonts, and support RTL
trans-unit.target: Adjust layout and fonts, and support RTL

trans-unit.source: Develop your app to support the layouts and fonts of multiple languages, including RTL (right-to-left) flow direction.
trans-unit.target: Develop your app to support the layouts and fonts of multiple languages, including RTL (right-to-left) flow direction.

trans-unit.source: Prepare your app for localization
trans-unit.target: Prepare your app for localization

trans-unit.source: Prepare your app for localization to other markets, languages, or regions.
trans-unit.target: Prepare your app for localization to other markets, languages, or regions.

trans-unit.source: Put UI strings into resources
trans-unit.target: Put UI strings into resources

trans-unit.source: Put string resources for your UI into resource files.
trans-unit.target: Put string resources for your UI into resource files.

trans-unit.source: You can then reference those strings from your code or markup.
trans-unit.target: You can then reference those strings from your code or markup.

trans-unit.source: See also the documentation originally created for Windows 8.x, which still applies to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps and Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: See also the documentation originally created for Windows 8.x, which still applies to Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps and Windows 10.
